Project Details:
Project Title:- Onedirect CEM Tool                                                                  Duration: Aug 2016 to March 2018
Company Name: ODCEM Technologies Pvt Ltd.
Role:  Software Tester.
Domain: CRM
Description:-  OneDirect is a web based application which helps an organization to connect with their customers
across all touch points like facebook, twitter, blogs, forum, email and play store etc. It provides a feature to
respond to actionable items across all channels from one single dashboard advanced ticketing system with auto
assignment, SLAs, ticket tagging, canned responses & a lot more. Some of well know clients of OneDirect are
Indian Railways, Aircel, Ola, HDFC Bank, Kotak Bank, Domino’s, Mahindra Reva, pepper fry, Tata and many more
(75+ clients).
Roles and Responsibilities:
❖  Analyzing the requirements from Business Requirements Document and software requirement
specification.
❖  Responsible for designing and developing of test case, test scenarios and their execution.
